mapper.sql: f_id, f_agen_idcode, f_agen_name, f_agen_type, f_place_id, f_agen_time, f_type, f_bill_batch_id, f_bill_serial_id, f_bill_no, f_time, f_account, f_account_id, f_version, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_wait_account, f_account_type, f_account_status, f_operator, f_operator_id, f_payer_tel, f_node
mapper.select: select f_id, f_agen_idcode, f_agen_name, f_place_id, f_agen_time, f_type, f_bill_batch_id, f_bill_serial_id, f_bill_no, f_time, f_account, f_account_id, f_version,f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_wait_account, f_account_type, f_account_status, f_operator, f_operator_id,f_payer_tel,f_node from fne_cbill_accounting where f_bill_serial_id = #{billSerialId}

select f_id, f_agen_idcode, f_agen_name,f_place_id, f_agen_time, f_type, f_bill_batch_id, f_bill_serial_id, f_bill_no, f_time, f_account, f_account_id, f_version,f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_wait_account, f_account_type, f_account_status, f_operator, f_operator_id,f_payer_tel,f_node from fne_cbill_accounting where f_bill_no = #{billNo}

select f_id, f_agen_idcode, f_agen_name, f_place_id, f_agen_time, f_type, f_bill_batch_id, f_bill_serial_id, f_bill_no, f_time, f_account, f_account_id, f_version,f_create_time, f_update_time, f_logic_delete, f_wait_account, f_account_type, f_account_status, f_operator, f_operator_id,f_payer_tel,f_node from fne_cbill_accounting where f_agen_idcode = #{agenId}
